title: Why are gameplay mods deleting threads about gameplay
body:
Why are mods deleting threads about Yasuo?
Yasuo is currently above 40% presence in master+
Yasuo is above 70% in plat+
Why are the gameplay mods treating legitimate gameplay threads about this legitimate problem as if they're rant/troll threads?
Hello where else are people supposed to talk about one of the most broken champs on the current patch?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not sure exactly what threads you are referencing, but I can take a look if you can provide me links.  Right now the only recent removals I can find were either a sarcasm thread which was better suited to General Discussion and an actual spam thread that consisted only of "lol" in title and body.

Do you have any links to these thread so that I can better evaluate them?

In general, we do remove low effort posts that do not provide any aspects for discussion (i.e. please nerf) as well as rants which merely express frustration about a subject (i.e. Yasuo is OP wtf Rito?  His kit is complete bullshit!  Remove the crits from him now and gut his windwall).  When we make decisions on moving content to Rant or removing for low effort, we generally consider how readers are intended to respond to the content.  If a thread has really only "yeah he OP" or "nah he's not" as responses, it's probably low effort.  Gameplay isn't really the sub-board for complaining, but rather discussion and suggestions for how to change things for the better as well as receive advice from the community.

Hope that helps clarify a bit

It is happening with a lot of different things.
I posted a thread about the Rules and how they are vague and give incentive to abuse them and it was instantly downvoted of course.
But the thing is.. there is pretty clear misuse of power (I was targeted specifically after I disagreed with a mod that posted incorrect information).
And since then, I have had a thread deleted and a post deleted.
Despite both actually being more valid than over 70% of what is on the forums right now.

Riot directly asked me to post in Player Behavior. Then it was subsequently deleted, because it was the wrong category. Wait what? But it was you Riot that asked me to post THERE. This is me understanding Riot's algorithms and logic: ??????????????
The worst troll in the game is the one governing it.
It was such a good post too!
There goes Riot... ruining the experience to control us.

> [{quoted}](name=Elderly Woman,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-11-10T17:17:24.165+0000)
>
> Riot directly asked me to post in Player Behavior. Then it was subsequently deleted, because it was the wrong category. Wait what? But it was you Riot that asked me to post THERE. This is me understanding Riot's algorithms and logic: ??????????????
> The worst troll in the game is the one governing it.
> It was such a good post too!
> There goes Riot... ruining the experience to control us.

Riot told me to post on the boards once too.
It was then downvoted into oblivion by the people that just follow you around to downvote you because you disagree with them.
It is quite amusing.

> [{quoted}](name=Elderly Woman,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-11-10T17:17:24.165+0000)
>
> Riot directly asked me to post in Player Behavior. Then it was subsequently deleted, because it was the wrong category. Wait what? But it was you Riot that asked me to post THERE. This is me understanding Riot's algorithms and logic: ??????????????
> The worst troll in the game is the one governing it.

I've looked up your removal and the issue was it appeared more as satire rather than an actual discussion and was discussing matchmaking instead of rule violations.  While I can see that you were trying to discuss what to do when players play poorly in your game and were suggesting there be an option to report bad matchmaking to Riot, there is a bit of confusion with the whole "wet cardboard rank" part.

Player Behavior is for discussing in game violations, bans, the rules of League, the Terms of Use, and the IFS.  In general, matchmaking discussion goes more into General Discussion.  I will be bringing it up to the team if there is a disconnect between us and Riot Support.

It originated in Player Behavior, and turned into a GREAT discussion, that was subsequently ruined by Riot. I won't be using your boards anymore. Waste of my time. Yall are control freaks, and it's sickening.

They also removed topics about matchmaking, with stats and everything. A bit... "_peculiar_".

They really should be more efficient and careful, since for whatever reason these Boards don't have a simple **"lock topic" option**, and they can just delete the whole thread. Happy 10 year anniversary, btw :D
There was a Yasuo thread yesterday with legitimate reasoning and civil discussion with almost 3 pages of replies, and it got deleted.
Better question is why AREN'T they deleting the URF threads?

What exactly is being written in the threads?
Because if they are simply "nerf yasuo pls too op!" then it makes sense but it's legit constructive...then i don't know...

> [{quoted}](name=DalekZec,realm=EUNE,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-10T00:04:52.168+0000)
>
> What exactly is being written in the threads?
> Because if they are simply "nerf yasuo pls too op!" then it makes sense but it's legit constructive...then i don't know...

They weren't just "Yas OP need nerf" 

The last one talked about crit passive and a few other things. 

They're literally just deleting everything that gets upvoted on the topic

> [{quoted}](name=Worst JG Wins,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-10T00:08:10.229+0000)
>
> They weren't just "Yas OP need nerf" 
> 
> The last one talked about crit passive and a few other things. 
> 
> They're literally just deleting everything that gets upvoted on the topic

Some serious discussion is needed and I don't think it's appropriate to discuss here...more like a freaken discord group call to the mods.
And I'll be happy to join in with this and see wtf is going on.
Biased mods
crit items are changing next season so he'll be nerfed that way.  ( iirc the zeal items are getting more expensive )

> [{quoted}](name=Doopliss7,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-11-10T01:04:57.170+0000)
>
> crit items are changing next season so he'll be nerfed that way.  ( iirc the zeal items are getting more expensive )

They're buffing crit items. The zeal items are the same price zeal cost 200 more gold but gives 10% more crit which is a net buff and builds out of cloak of agility instead of brawlers gloves and Cloak is just straight buffed from 20 to 25% crit at the same cost. 

But this is off topic
Wait you said zeal items are same price. But then said zeal items cost 200 more gold?

Zeal items as in {{item:3085}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} are the same price. 

He said ZEAL is 200g more.

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeRework,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-11-10T03:38:55.807+0000)
>
> Wait you said zeal items are same price. But then said zeal items cost 200 more gold?

{{item:3086}} is 200 more gold but gives 25% crit instead of 15%
Full zeal items aka {{item:3087}} are the same price. 
All and all they're buffing crit itemization.

Yas can actually hit 100% crit at 2200 gold on pbe.

The mods are struggling to deal with the new “Rant” subboard and trying to figure out what kind of posts belong there. 

The new hot phrase is “Low Effort” and these mods spit it out like crazy now. They need a chance and quick.

These boards are straight out of Orwells 1984.  

First it was - No racism ... ok fine understandable.
Then it was ... no arguing or fighting with each other... ok fine...
Now its ... Nothing I dont agree with because it is "Low Effort"...............

> [{quoted}](name=Ýisus,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2019-11-10T11:24:27.017+0000)
>
> These boards are straight out of Orwells 1984.  
> 
> First it was - No racism ... ok fine understandable.
> Then it was ... no arguing or fighting with each other... ok fine...
> Now its ... Nothing I dont agree with because it is "Low Effort"...............

I think the boards are bullshit sometimes but this is a HUUUUUUUUUGE stretch dude. You also point out "No racism" in a way that implies the rule was unnecessary hahaha

>  You also point out "No racism" in a way that implies the rule was unnecessary hahaha

I'm not seeing it, I stated it was an understandable rule.  Some food for thought - League is 1 of the few games I have ever experienced racist commentary in.  League is also the only game I have ever seen where "racism" is made into such a thing.  Played Everquest since 2001 .... Can't think of a time when I ever heard a racist comment in the general chats ...

Maybe it is just generational though?  The average Everquest player is 40+ ... the average LoL player is 15.  So maybe millennials are just far more racist than their generation X counterparts?
Ah, yes, because forcing a basic level of effort to your posts in what's supposed to be a constructive section is somehow the same as a fictional dystopia.

Talking about Yasuo is welcome. Useless ranting, along the lines of "yasuop is obv op look at all these ability descriptions ya ikr like i said so op," is not.

To answer your question of where you're supposed to do that, that would be the RANT section.

> [{quoted}](name=Worst JG Wins,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-10T00:56:13.071+0000)
>
> Please stop spamming the boards with you're ridiculous strawman as if it's some counterargument. Nobody cares about you strawmen and backseat moderation.

I am posting in response to garbage threads and meta threads about them, and I don't reply to all of them, so if anything it's the garbage that's being spammed.

> [{quoted}](name=Worst JG Wins,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=TKltWgEG,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-10T00:56:13.071+0000)
>
> Also "why are you saying "You're" none of my discussion were deleted i'm defending someone else here. 
> Also my question wasn't your strawman of where are you supposed to post rants
> My question was why are mods deleting gameplay threads just because the topic is about the sacred cow Yasuo.

You asked:

> where else are people supposed to talk about one of the most broken champs on the current patch?

I'm saying "you" because the advice applies to you, a person, or the generic "you," anyone, who wants to post a thread like this.

You asked where to post threads of this type. Threads on Gameplay need at least a modicum of effort that might prompt actual discussion. Threads of the type that just got deleted, however, are rants, which belong in RANT. Therefore, threads of this type belong in RANT. QED.
I seriously don't understand why everyone says yasuo is op. I don't lane much but when I do and I'm against yasuo, I don't have any big problems. I havent even seen a yasuo do good in a long while.

The threads get deleted when the chat turns to BM which is usually a trend with Yasuo hate threads. 

The one you are mentioning in particular segwayed into how Yasuo is viewed differently in different regions then people decided to start attacking people of those specific regions.
It's because its oversaturated everyone knows hes unfun to play against but people are just posting to get likes
